text:
Memorandum

To: D. Lyden
R. L, Llewellyn
L. W. Butler
W. G. Lampert

 

H. B. Higgins
ce: J. A. Broughton
F. E. McKeown

 

M. |W. Schofield 8
M. Marshall

sy, From: E, A, Willets, I

 

Date: April 18, 1978

Subject: KOOL Super Lights' Advertising Support

Attached are KOOL Super Lights' Local Market Activity sheets
for each Trading Area. These sheets summarize the extent,
timing, and variety of KOOL Super Lights' local market advertising
for each selected market by Trading Area. It is felt that this
information could be a useful selling tool for the Sales Force. This
information does, however, comprise the heart of the KOOL Super
Lights media plan in 1978 and-is, therefore, highly confidential.
‘May I suggest that Department Managers receive only those Trading
Area sheets which coincide with his geographic responsibility in
order to insure against the possibility of the total plan inadvertently
falling into the wrong hands.

  

Please let me know if you have any questions or comments about
these documents, Thank you. .

   

  
  

hak

EA, W.

 

EAW/ald

996260099

 

Attachment

660092966
PRODUCED FROM B&W WEB SITE
